jobDescription: Contracts Data AnalystThe Contracts Data Contractor, based in our new Hollywood office, reports to Content Rights and Contract Management team. The contractor will be responsible for uploading contracts and assigning metadata in our contracts management tool. They will support an innovative, rapidly-evolving team that is supporting departments across the business.Responsibilities:Monitor contracts submitted via the contracts tool and via email and upload contracts to our contracts database in a timely mannerAssign metadata to new contracts, and backfill new metadata fields to existing contractsVerify that all submitted contracts are complete (e.g. no missing exhibits, signatures, dates), and interface with stakeholders for additional information as requiredPerform data clean-up projects (e.g. eliminating duplicate entries, validating metadata)Work on projects supporting the migration of and/or sharing of data between the contracts database and other internal toolsRequirements:
